id: scenario-value-scanner-middle-aged-scenarios-workplace-organizational-mentoring and leadership valued as care contribution
title: Mentoring and leadership valued as care contribution
description: Mentoring and leadership valued as care contribution
content:
Scenario: Mentoring and leadership valued as care contribution
    Given Robert mentors junior employees and provides leadership
    And workplace mentoring is care work
    And his leadership develops others' capabilities
    When workplace_elohim recognizes workplace care contributions
    Then it should value Robert's mentoring as care economy participation
    And track his contributions: mentoring relationships, team development, organizational leadership
    And recognize that developing others is care for people and organization
    And demonstrate that leadership is care work
    And value workplace care contributions in care token economy
    And build understanding that all work includes care dimensions
    And integrate workplace care with broader care economy participation
